com.intel.bigdatamem

Interface Allocatable<A extends CommonAllocator<A>>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Allocator<A>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BigDataMemAllocator, BigDataPMemAllocator, CommonAllocator, CommonPersistAllocator, SysMemAllocator

    public interface Allocatable<A extends CommonAllocator<A>>
    an interface to allocate memory resources from any underlying memory kind of storage.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MemBufferHolder<A> createBuffer(long size)
      create a memory buffer that is managed by its holder.
      MemBufferHolder<A> createBuffer(long size, boolean autoreclaim)
      create a memory buffer that is managed by its holder.
      MemChunkHolder<A> createChunk(long size)
      create a memory chunk that is managed by its holder.
      MemChunkHolder<A> createChunk(long size, boolean autoreclaim)
      create a memory chunk that is managed by its holder.
      void registerBufferAutoReclaim(MemBufferHolder<A> mholder)
      register a memory buffer for auto-reclaim
      void registerChunkAutoReclaim(MemChunkHolder<A> mholder)
      register a memory chunk for auto-reclaim
      MemBufferHolder<A> resizeBuffer(MemBufferHolder<A> mholder, long size)
      resize a memory buffer.
      MemChunkHolder<A> resizeChunk(MemChunkHolder<A> mholder, long size)
      resize a memory chunk.

    • Method Detail

      • createChunk

        MemChunkHolder<A> createChunk(long size,
                              boolean autoreclaim)
        create a memory chunk that is managed by its holder.
        Type Parameters:
        A - the type of bound allocator
        Parameters:
        size - specify the size of memory chunk
        autoreclaim - specify whether or not to reclaim this chunk automatically
        Returns:
        a holder contains a memory chunk

      • resizeChunk

        MemChunkHolder<A> resizeChunk(MemChunkHolder<A> mholder,
                              long size)
        resize a memory chunk.
        Type Parameters:
        A - the type of bound allocator
        Parameters:
        mholder - specify a chunk holder for resizing
        size - specify a new size of this memory chunk
        Returns:
        the resized memory chunk holder
